name: Rota (itch)
description:
This game was made in 6 and a half days for the 8 Bits to Infinity Puzzle Jam the Second.

Do take a look at the in-game help to get your bearings. If that isn't helpful, feel free to hit up this page and I'll do my best to answer any questions.

Please leave a comment (feedback is always appreciated!) and follow this page to get updates on whatever mad science I'm up to at the moment.

Background Image by Annie Spratt from Unsplash.com
